12465498Di2015UniqueSeparatorabstract class Node { }Di2015NewLineenum BooleanOperator { And, Or }Di2015NewLinesealed class BooleanNode : NodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public BooleanOperator Operator { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public Node Left { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public Node Right { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public BooleanNode(BooleanOperator op, Node left, Node right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Operator = op;Di2015NewLine        Left = left;Di2015NewLine        Right = right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinesealed class TagNode : NodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Tag { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public TagNode(string tag) { Tag = tag; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12465498Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Node ParseExpression(Token[] tok)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    return parseExpressionBoolOr(tok, ref i);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static Node parseExpressionBoolOr(Token[] tok, ref int i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var left = parseExpressionBoolAnd(tok, ref i);Di2015NewLine    while (tok[i].Type == TokenType.Or)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        i++;Di2015NewLine        var right = parseExpressionBoolAnd(tok, ref i);Di2015NewLine        left = new BooleanNode(BooleanOperator.Or, left, right);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return left;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static Node parseExpressionBoolAnd(Token[] tok, ref int i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var left = parseExpressionPrimary(tok, ref i);Di2015NewLine    while (tok[i].Type == TokenType.And)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        i++;Di2015NewLine        var right = parseExpressionPrimary(tok, ref i);Di2015NewLine        left = new BooleanNode(BooleanOperator.And, left, right);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return left;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static Node parseExpressionPrimary(Token[] tok, ref int i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (tok[i].Type == TokenType.OpenParenthesis)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        i++;Di2015NewLine        var node = parseExpressionBoolOr(tok, ref i);Di2015NewLine        if (tok[i].Type != TokenType.CloseParenthesis)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException();  // or customised parse exceptionDi2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (tok[i].Type == TokenType.Tag)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var node = new TagNode(tok[i].Item);Di2015NewLine        i++;Di2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException();  // or customised parse exceptionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12467168Di2015UniqueSeparator// Very basic (and CIE-incorrect) checkDi2015NewLinepublic static int isGray(Color c)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (Math.Abs(c.R - c.G) > 5 * 2.55) return 0; // Not gray. R and G too differentDi2015NewLine    if (Math.Abs(c.R - c.B) > 5 * 2.55) return 0;Di2015NewLine    if (Math.Abs(c.G - c.B) > 5 * 2.55) return 0;Di2015NewLine    return 1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// the blind man's test for shading :-)Di2015NewLinepublic static int isShadeOfRed(Color c)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (4*c.R < 5*c.G) return 0; // Red not strong enough in respect to greenDi2015NewLine    if (4*c.R < 5*c.B) return 0; // Red not strong enough in respect to blueDi2015NewLine    return 1; // Red is stronger enough than green and blue to be called "shade of red"Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// (shades of green and blue left as an exercise)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Very basic (and CIE-incorrect) checkDi2015NewLinepublic static int areSameColor(Color a, Color b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (Math.Abs(a.R - b.R) > 5 * 2.55) return 0;Di2015NewLine    if (Math.Abs(a.G - b.G) > 5 * 2.55) return 0; Di2015NewLine    if (Math.Abs(a.B - b.B) > 5 * 2.55) return 0;Di2015NewLine    return 1; // "more or less" the same colorDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This is more or less pseudo code...Di2015NewLinepublic static int isNoise(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ((x < 1) || (y < 1)) return 0; // or maybe "return 1"Di2015NewLine    if ((x+1 >= bmp.Width)||(y+1 >= bmp.Height)) return 0;Di2015NewLine    pix = bmp.GetPixel(x,y);Di2015NewLine    for (i = -1; i <= 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        for (j = -1; j <= 1; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((i == 0) && (j == 0)) continue;Di2015NewLine            test = bmp.GetPixel(x+i, y+j);Di2015NewLine            if (isGray(test)) grays++;Di2015NewLine            if (isSameColor(pix, test)) same++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    // Pixel surrounded by grays, and has no neighbours of the same colourDi2015NewLine    // (who knows, maybe we could skip gray calculation and check altogether?)Di2015NewLine    // is noise.Di2015NewLine    if ((grays == 5) && (same == 0))Di2015NewLine       return 1;Di2015NewLine    return 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// NOTE: do not immediately set to gray pixels found to be noise, for their neighboursDi2015NewLine// will be calculated using the new gray pixel. Damage to image might result.Di2015NewLine// Use a copy of bmp instead.Di2015NewLine

12467888Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int ID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int ParentID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sections = new List<Section>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                new Section { ID = 1, Name = "abc", ParentID = 0 },Di2015NewLine                new Section { ID = 2, Name = "def", ParentID = 1 },Di2015NewLine                new Section { ID = 3, Name = "ghi", ParentID = 1 },Di2015NewLine                new Section { ID = 4, Name = "jkl", ParentID = 0 },Di2015NewLine                new Section { ID = 5, Name = "mno", ParentID = 2 },Di2015NewLine                new Section { ID = 6, Name = "pqr", ParentID = 5 },Di2015NewLine                new Section { ID = 7, Name = "aaa", ParentID = 1 },Di2015NewLine                new Section { ID = 8, Name = "vwx", ParentID = 0 }Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sections = sections.OrderBy(x => x.ParentID).ThenBy(x => x.Name).ToList();Di2015NewLine        var stack = new Stack<Section>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Grab all the items without parentsDi2015NewLine        foreach (var section in sections.Where(x => x.ParentID == default(int)).Reverse())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(section);Di2015NewLine            sections.RemoveAt(0);   Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var output = new List<Section>();Di2015NewLine        while (stack.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var currentSection = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var children = sections.Where(x => x.ParentID == currentSection.ID).Reverse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var section in children)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                stack.Push(section);Di2015NewLine                sections.Remove(section);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            output.Add(currentSection);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sections = output;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12469486Di2015UniqueSeparator    // this will return a list of the values contained in the properties...Di2015NewLine    public List<string> GetListFromProperties<T>(T instance)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type t = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] props = t.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // As a simple list...Di2015NewLine        List<string> artists = new List<string>(props.Length);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < props.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(!props[i].Name.Contains("_artist")){ continue; }Di2015NewLine            artists.Add(props[i].GetValue(instance, null).ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return artists;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this will return a dictionary which has each artist storedDi2015NewLine    // under a key which is the name of the property the artist was in.Di2015NewLine    public Dictionary<string,string> GetDictionaryFromProperties<T>(T instance)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type t = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] props = t.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // As a dictionary...Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<string,string> artists = new Dictionary<string,string>(props.Length);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < props.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(artists.ContainsKey(props[i].Name) || !props[i].Name.Contains("_artist")){ continue; }Di2015NewLine            artists.Add(props[i].Name, props[i].GetValue(instance, null).ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return artists;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12473845Di2015UniqueSeparator// This method takes two sequences of T, and returnsDi2015NewLine//  - each element of the first sequence,Di2015NewLine//        wrapped in its own one-element sequenceDi2015NewLine//  - each element of the second sequence,Di2015NewLine//        wrapped in its own one-element sequenceDi2015NewLine//  - each pair of elements (one from each sequence),Di2015NewLine//        as a two-element sequence.Di2015NewLine// e.g. { 1 }.CrossWith({ 2 }) returns { { 1 }, { 2 }, { 1, 2 } }Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> CrossWith<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> source1,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> source2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach(T s1 in source1) yield return new[] { s1 };Di2015NewLine    foreach(T s2 in source2) yield return new[] { s2 };Di2015NewLine    foreach(T s1 in source1)Di2015NewLine        foreach(T s2 in source2)Di2015NewLine            yield return new[] { s1, s2 };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This method takes a sequence of sequences of T and a sequence of T,Di2015NewLine//     and returnsDi2015NewLine//  - each sequence from the first sequenceDi2015NewLine//  - each element of the second sequence,Di2015NewLine//        wrapped in its own one-element sequenceDi2015NewLine//  - each pair, with the element from the second sequence appended to theDi2015NewLine//        sequence from the first sequence.Di2015NewLine// e.g. { { 1, 2 } }.CrossWith({ 3 }) returnsDi2015NewLine//      { { 1, 2 }, { 3 }, { 1, 2, 3 } }Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> CrossWith<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> source1,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> source2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach(IEnumerable<T> s1 in source1) yield return s1;Di2015NewLine    foreach(T s2 in source2) yield return new[] { s2 };Di2015NewLine    foreach(IEnumerable<T> s1 in source1)Di2015NewLine        foreach(T s2 in source2)Di2015NewLine            yield return s1.Concat(new[] { s2 }).ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar cross = lBag1.CrossWith(lBag2).CrossWith(lBag3);Di2015NewLine// { "1_0" }, { "1_1" }, { "1_3" } ...Di2015NewLine// ... { "1_0", "11_0" }, ...Di2015NewLine

12478879Di2015UniqueSeparatorlocalVariable
12478879Di2015UniqueSeparatorMain
12478879Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // an instance of Foo is created and pushed on the heapDi2015NewLine    // localVariable is now pointing to the address of this instanceDi2015NewLine    // localVariable itself is stored on the stackDi2015NewLine    Foo localVariable = new Foo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // someStaticVar is now pointing to the same location on the heap asDi2015NewLine    // the localVariable - the Foo instance created earlierDi2015NewLine    someStaticVar = localVariable; Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine// at this stage the Main method finishes executing and all localDi2015NewLine// variables are falling out of scope. But since you have a static variableDi2015NewLine// pointing to the Foo instance that was created inside the Main method thisDi2015NewLine// instance is not illegible for garbage collection because there are still Di2015NewLine// references to it (someStaticVar).Di2015NewLine

12479990Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class EnumTypeConverter : EnumConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public EnumTypeConverter()Di2015NewLine        : base(typeof(Enum))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public EnumTypeConverter(Type type)Di2015NewLine        : base(type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvertFrom(ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type sourceType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sourceType == typeof(string) || TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(typeof(Enum)).CanConvertFrom(context, sourceType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ConvertFrom(ITypeDescriptorContext context, CultureInfo culture, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value is string)Di2015NewLine            return GetEnumValue(EnumType, (string)value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (value is Enum)Di2015NewLine            return GetEnumDescription((Enum)value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return base.ConvertFrom(context, culture, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ConvertTo(ITypeDescriptorContext context, CultureInfo culture, object value, Type destinationType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value is Enum && destinationType == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine            return GetEnumDescription((Enum)value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (value is string && destinationType == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine            return GetEnumDescription(EnumType, (string)value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return base.ConvertTo(context, culture, value, destinationType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool GetIsEnumBrowsable(Enum value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var fieldInfo = value.GetType().GetField(value.ToString());Di2015NewLine        var attributes = (BrowsableAttribute[])fieldInfo.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(BrowsableAttribute), false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return !(attributes.Length > 0) || attributes[0].Browsable;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GetEnumDescription(Enum value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var fieldInfo = value.GetType().GetField(value.ToString());Di2015NewLine        var attributes = (DescriptionAttribute[])fieldInfo.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DescriptionAttribute), false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (attributes.Length > 0) ? attributes[0].Description : value.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GetEnumDescription(Type value, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var fieldInfo = value.GetField(name);Di2015NewLine        var attributes = (DescriptionAttribute[])fieldInfo.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DescriptionAttribute), false);Di2015NewLine        return (attributes.Length > 0) ? attributes[0].Description : name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static object GetEnumValue(Type value, string description)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var fields = value.GetFields();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var fieldInfo in fields)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var attributes = (DescriptionAttribute[])fieldInfo.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DescriptionAttribute), false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (attributes.Length > 0 && attributes[0].Description == description)Di2015NewLine                return fieldInfo.GetValue(fieldInfo.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (fieldInfo.Name == description)Di2015NewLine                return fieldInfo.GetValue(fieldInfo.Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return description;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool GetPropertiesSupported(ITypeDescriptorContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues(ITypeDescriptorContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return base.GetStandardValues(context);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12491918Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LocalesRetrievalException : ExceptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public LocalesRetrievalException(string message)Di2015NewLine        : base(message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class CultureHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region Windows APIDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private delegate bool EnumLocalesProcExDelegate(Di2015NewLine       [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPWStr)]String lpLocaleString,Di2015NewLine       LocaleType dwFlags, int lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport(@"kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true, CharSet = CharSet.Unicode)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern bool EnumSystemLocalesEx(EnumLocalesProcExDelegate pEnumProcEx,Di2015NewLine       LocaleType dwFlags, int lParam, IntPtr lpReserved);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private enum LocaleType : uintDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LocaleAll = 0x00000000,             // Enumerate all named based localesDi2015NewLine        LocaleWindows = 0x00000001,         // Shipped locales and/or replacements for themDi2015NewLine        LocaleSupplemental = 0x00000002,    // Supplemental locales onlyDi2015NewLine        LocaleAlternateSorts = 0x00000004,  // Alternate sort localesDi2015NewLine        LocaleNeutralData = 0x00000010,     // Locales that are "neutral" (language only, region data is default)Di2015NewLine        LocaleSpecificData = 0x00000020,    // Locales that contain language and region dataDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public enum CultureTypes : uintDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SpecificCultures = LocaleType.LocaleSpecificData,Di2015NewLine        NeutralCultures = LocaleType.LocaleNeutralData,Di2015NewLine        AllCultures = LocaleType.LocaleWindowsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IReadOnlyCollection<CultureInfo> GetCultures(Di2015NewLine       CultureTypes cultureTypes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<CultureInfo> cultures = new List<CultureInfo>();Di2015NewLine        EnumLocalesProcExDelegate enumCallback = (locale, flags, lParam) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cultures.Add(new CultureInfo(locale));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (CultureNotFoundException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // This culture is not supported by .NET (not happened so far)Di2015NewLine                // Must be ignored.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (EnumSystemLocalesEx(enumCallback, (LocaleType)cultureTypes, 0,Di2015NewLine           (IntPtr)0) == false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int errorCode = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine            throw new LocalesRetrievalException("Win32 error " + errorCode +Di2015NewLine               " while trying to get the Windows locales");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the two neutral cultures that Windows misses Di2015NewLine        // (CultureInfo.GetCultures adds them also):Di2015NewLine        if (cultureTypes == CultureTypes.NeutralCultures ||Di2015NewLine           cultureTypes == CultureTypes.AllCultures)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cultures.Add(new CultureInfo("zh-CHS"));Di2015NewLine            cultures.Add(new CultureInfo("zh-CHT"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new ReadOnlyCollection<CultureInfo>(cultures);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12492243Di2015UniqueSeparator    public byte[] sign(string text)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine//Password for the PFX certificateDi2015NewLine            string password = "1234";Di2015NewLine//Importing the PFX certificate that contains the private key which will be used for creating the digital signatureDi2015NewLine            X509Certificate2 cert = new X509Certificate2("c:\\\\certificate.pfx", password);Di2015NewLine//declaring RSA cryptographic service providerDi2015NewLine            RSACryptoServiceProvider crypt = (RSACryptoServiceProvider)cert.PrivateKey;Di2015NewLine//cryptographic hash of type SHA1Di2015NewLine            SHA1Managed sha1 = new SHA1Managed();Di2015NewLine//encoding the data to be signedDi2015NewLine            UnicodeEncoding encoding = new UnicodeEncoding();Di2015NewLine            byte[] data = encoding.GetBytes(text);Di2015NewLine//generate HashDi2015NewLine            byte[] hash = sha1.ComputeHash(data);Di2015NewLine//sign HashDi2015NewLine            return crypt.SignHash(hash, CryptoConfig.MapNameToOID("SHA1"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

12493604Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<int> offsets = new List<int>();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < num_pointers; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Note: There is no need to set the position in the stream asDi2015NewLine    // the Read method will advance the stream to the next positionDi2015NewLine    // automatically.Di2015NewLine    // br.BaseStream.Position = i * 4 + 4;Di2015NewLine    offsets.Add(br.ReadInt32());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12493604Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<int,string> values = new Dictionary<int,string>();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < offsets.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int currentOffset = offsets[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If it is the last offset we just read until the end of the streamDi2015NewLine    int nextOffset = (i + 1) < offsets.Count ? offsets[i + 1] : (int)br.BaseStream.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Note: Under the supplied encoding, a character will take 2 bytes.Di2015NewLine    // Therefore we will need to divide the delta (in bytes) by 2.Di2015NewLine    int stringLength = (nextOffset - currentOffset - 1) / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    br.BaseStream.Position = currentOffset;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var chars = br.ReadChars(stringLength);Di2015NewLine    values.Add(currentOffset, new String(chars));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now populate the view with the data...Di2015NewLineforeach(int offset in offsets)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    listView1.Items.Add(offset.ToString("X")).SubItems.Add(values[offset]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12494657Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Int64 TestNHSQLiteBulk(bool newDB)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int ProjectCount = 1000000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var factory = Database.CreateSQLiteSessionFactory(newDB);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var classMapping = (SingleTableEntityPersister)factory.GetClassMetadata(typeof(Project));Di2015NewLine    var generator = classMapping.IdentifierGenerator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Int64 objectCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var session = factory.OpenStatelessSession())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var connection = session.Connection;Di2015NewLine        using (var transaction = session.BeginTransaction(System.Data.IsolationLevel.ReadCommitted))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var command = connection.CreateCommand();Di2015NewLine            command.CommandText = "Insert INTO Project (ProjectId, ProjectName) Values(?,?)";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var projectIdParameter = command.CreateParameter();Di2015NewLine            projectIdParameter.ParameterName = "ProjectId";Di2015NewLine            projectIdParameter.DbType = System.Data.DbType.Int32;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var projectNameParameter = command.CreateParameter();Di2015NewLine            projectNameParameter.ParameterName = "ProjectName";Di2015NewLine            projectNameParameter.DbType = System.Data.DbType.String;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            command.Parameters.Add(projectIdParameter);Di2015NewLine            command.Parameters.Add(projectNameParameter);Di2015NewLine            command.Prepare();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int p = 0; p < ProjectCount; p++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var projectId = (long)generator.Generate(session.GetSessionImplementation(), null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //using prepared command is almost 2x faster!Di2015NewLine                projectIdParameter.Value = projectId;Di2015NewLine                projectNameParameter.Value = "Project" + projectId;Di2015NewLine                command.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                objectCount++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            transaction.Commit();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return objectCount;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12495410Di2015UniqueSeparator public class RecursiveDeleteCustomActionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [CustomAction]Di2015NewLine        public static ActionResult RecursiveDeleteCosting(Session session)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // SOMECOMPONENTID is the Id attribute of a component in your install that you want to use to trigger this happeningDi2015NewLine            const string ComponentID = "SOMECOMPONENTID";Di2015NewLine            // SOMEDIRECTORYID would likely be INSTALLDIR or INSTALLLOCATION depending on your MSIDi2015NewLine            const string DirectoryID = "SOMEDIRECTORYID";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var result = ActionResult.Success;Di2015NewLine            int index = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string installLocation = session[DirectoryID];Di2015NewLine                session.Log("Directory to clean is {0}", installLocation);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Author rows for root directoryDi2015NewLine                // * means all filesDi2015NewLine                // null means the directory itselfDi2015NewLine                var fields = new object[] { "CLEANROOTFILES", ComponentID, "*", DirectoryID, 3 };Di2015NewLine                InsertRecord(session, "RemoveFile", fields);Di2015NewLine                fields = new object[] { "CLEANROOTDIRECTORY", ComponentID, "", DirectoryID, 3 };Di2015NewLine                InsertRecord(session, "RemoveFile", fields);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if( Directory.Exists(installLocation))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (string directory in Directory.GetDirectories(installLocation, "*", SearchOption.AllDirectories))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        session.Log("Processing Subdirectory {0}", directory);Di2015NewLine                        string key = string.Format("CLEANSUBFILES{0}", index);Di2015NewLine                        string key2 = string.Format("CLEANSUBDIRECTORY{0}", index);Di2015NewLine                        session[key] = directory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        fields = new object[] { key, ComponentID, "*", key, 3 };Di2015NewLine                        InsertRecord(session, "RemoveFile", fields);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        fields = new object[] { key2, ComponentID, "", key, 3 };Di2015NewLine                        InsertRecord(session, "RemoveFile", fields);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        index++;     Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                session.Log(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine                result = ActionResult.Failure;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private static void InsertRecord(Session session, string tableName, Object[] objects)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Database db = session.Database; Di2015NewLine            string sqlInsertSring = db.Tables[tableName].SqlInsertString + " TEMPORARY";Di2015NewLine            session.Log("SqlInsertString is {0}", sqlInsertSring);Di2015NewLine            View view = db.OpenView(sqlInsertSring); Di2015NewLine            view.Execute(new Record(objects)); Di2015NewLine            view.Close(); Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12495597Di2015UniqueSeparator65536
12495713Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string GetAnswer()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DateTime birthday = calBirthDate.SelectedDate;Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan difference = DateTime.Now.Date - birthday;Di2015NewLine    int leapYears = CountLeapYears(birthday);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int days = (int)difference.TotalDays - leapYears;Di2015NewLine    int hours = (int)difference.TotalHours - leapYears * 24;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int years = days / 365;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String answer = String.Format("Age: {0} years", years);Di2015NewLine    answer += Environment.NewLine;Di2015NewLine    answer += String.Format("Days: {0}*365+{1} = {2}", years, days - years * 365, days);Di2015NewLine    answer += Environment.NewLine;Di2015NewLine    answer += String.Format("Days Hours: {0}*24 = {1}", hours / 24, hours);Di2015NewLine    return answer;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate int CountLeapYears(DateTime startDate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int year = startDate.Year; year <= DateTime.Now.Year; year++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (DateTime.IsLeapYear(year))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DateTime february29 = new DateTime(year, 2, 29);Di2015NewLine            if (february29 >= startDate && february29 <= DateTime.Now.Date)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                count++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12495758Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<T>.Sort
12495758Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int listSize = 1000;Di2015NewLineconst int sampleSize = 10000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar sortedList = Enumerable.Range(0,listSize).ToList();Di2015NewLinevar unsortedList = new List<int>(sortedList);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar sortedCount = 0;Di2015NewLinesortedList.Sort((l,r) => {sortedCount++; return l - r;});Di2015NewLine//sortedCount.Dump("Sorted");Di2015NewLine// Returns: 10519   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar totalUnsortedComparisons = 0;Di2015NewLinefor(var i = 0; i < sampleSize; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var unsortedCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    unsortedList.Shuffle();Di2015NewLine    unsortedList.Sort((l,r) => {unsortedCount++; return l - r;});Di2015NewLine    totalUnsortedComparisons += unsortedCount;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//(totalUnsortedComparisons / sampleSize).Dump("Unsorted");Di2015NewLine// Returns: 13547Di2015NewLine
12495836Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<Tuple<T1, IEnumerable<T2>>> ConditionalZip<T1, T2>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T1> src1,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T2> src2,Di2015NewLine    Func<T1, T2, bool> check)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var list = new List<T2>();Di2015NewLine    using(var enumerator = src2.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach(var item1 in src1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while(enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var pickedItem = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                if(check(item1, pickedItem))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    list.Add(pickedItem);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var items = list.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            list.Clear();Di2015NewLine            yield return new Tuple<T1, IEnumerable<T2>>(item1, items);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

               uploadFile.fileType = MediaType._PLAINTEXT;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            uploadFile.fileType = MediaType._PLAINTEXT;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine Di2015NewLine       if(resEnt.Properties["GivenName"] != null && Di2015NewLine          resEnt.Properties["GivenName"].Count > 0) Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           givenName = resEnt.Properties["GivenName"].Value;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // samAccountName is a *must* property - it has to be set.Di2015NewLine       samAccountName = resEnt.Properties["samAccountName"].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if(resEnt.Properties["sn"] != null && Di2015NewLine          resEnt.Properties["sn"].Count > 0) Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           surName = resEnt.Properties["sn"].Value;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       comboBox2.Items.Add(givenName + " " + surName + " " + "[" + samAccountName + "]");Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       // MessageBox.Show(e.ToString());Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12502297Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass FileTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int MyProperty { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass MFileType : FileTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int MyProperty2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Class1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public MFileType DefaultFileType { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass Class2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public virtual FileType DefaultFileType { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AutoMapper.Mapper.CreateMap<Class1, Class2>()Di2015NewLine            .ForMember(dest => dest.DefaultFileType, opt => opt.MapFrom(src => src.DefaultFileType));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var class1 = new Class1() { Id = "class1", DefaultFileType = new MFileType() { MyProperty = 1, MyProperty2 = 2 } };Di2015NewLine        var class2 = AutoMapper.Mapper.Map<Class2>(class1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("class2.Id = " + class2.Id);Di2015NewLine        // If below it says "False", it mapped correctlyDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("class2.DefaultFileType == null = " + class2.DefaultFileType == null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12503380Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AttributeComparer : IComparer<Attribute>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Comparer(Attribute x, Attribute y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(x == null) return y == null ? 0 : -1;Di2015NewLine        if(y == null) return 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(x is IsInPkAttribute) return (y is IsInPkAttribute) ? 0 : 1;Di2015NewLine        else if(y is IsInPkAttribute) return -1;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            xa = (IncludeInEditorAttribute)x;Di2015NewLine            ya = (IncludeInEditorAttribute)y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(xa.IsReadOnlyOnModify == ya.IsReadOnlyOnModify) return 0;Di2015NewLine            else return x.IsReadOnlyOnModify ? 1 : -1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12508525Di2015UniqueSeparatorLib::MyStruct* data;Di2015NewLinelong size = svc->GetData(&data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor(size_t i = 0; i < size; ++i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Lib::MyStruct& current = data[i];Di2015NewLine  long val = current.Value;Di2015NewLine  bstr_t unit = current.Unit;Di2015NewLine  // ...Di2015NewLine}                                           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// now you need to release the memory. However, if you marshalDi2015NewLine// strings in struct as BSTRs, you need to first release them byDi2015NewLine// calling SysFreeString. This is why I prefer to marshal stringsDi2015NewLine// as arrays whenever I can: you can still easily construct a bstr_tDi2015NewLine// in your client code, but you don't need to release them explicitlyDi2015NewLineCoTaskMemFree(data);Di2015NewLine

12513296Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class ProgressForm : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private readonly CancellationTokenSource _cancellationTokenSource;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public ProgressForm(CancellationTokenSource cancellationTokenSource, IProgress<string> progress)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    _cancellationTokenSource = cancellationTokenSource;Di2015NewLine    progress.ProgressChanged += ((o, i) => this.ProgressLabel.Text = i.ToString());Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static void ShowDialog(CancellationTokenSource cancellationTokenSource, IProgress<string> progress)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    using (var progressForm = new ProgressForm(cancellationTokenSource, progress))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        progressForm.ShowDialog();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void CancelXButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (this._cancellationTokenSource != null)Di2015NewLine      this._cancellationTokenSource.Cancel();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12513296Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class FriendlyTaskRunnerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static async Task<T> Execute<T>(Func<CancellationToken, IProgress<string>, Task<T>> operation)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var cancellationTokenSource = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine    var progress = new Progress<string>();Di2015NewLine    var timeout = Task.Delay(1000);Di2015NewLine    var operationTask = operation(cancellationTokenSource.Token, progress);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Synchronously block for either the operation to complete or a timeout;Di2015NewLine    //  if the operation completes first, just return the result.Di2015NewLine    var completedTask = Task.WhenAny(timeout, operationTask).Result;Di2015NewLine    if (completedTask == operationTask)Di2015NewLine      return await operationTask;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Kick off a progress form and have it close when the task completes.Di2015NewLine    using (var progressForm = new ProgressForm(cancellationTokenSource, progress))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      operationTask.ContinueWith(_ => { progressForm.Close(); });Di2015NewLine      progressForm.ShowDialog();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return await operationTask;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12515436Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Excel.Range[] RandomRows(int randomRowsToGet, string worksheetLocation, int worksheetNumber = 1, int lowestRow = 0, int highestRow = 99)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Excel.Range[] rows = new Excel.Range[randomRowsToGet];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Excel.Application excel = new Excel.Application();Di2015NewLine    Excel.Workbook workbook = excel.Workbooks.Open(worksheetLocation);Di2015NewLine    Excel.Worksheet worksheet = workbook.Worksheets[worksheetNumber];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<int> rowNumbers = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool allUniqueNumbers = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (!allUniqueNumbers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int nextNumber = random.Next(lowestRow, highestRow);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!rowNumbers.Contains(nextNumber))Di2015NewLine            rowNumbers.Add(nextNumber);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (rowNumbers.Count == randomRowsToGet)Di2015NewLine            allUniqueNumbers = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < randomRowsToGet; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        rows[i] = worksheet.UsedRange.Rows[rowNumbers[i]];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Marshal.ReleaseComObject(excel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return rows;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12517798Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyDataSource:NSOutlineViewDataSourceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// The list of persons (top level)Di2015NewLine    public List<Person> Persons {Di2015NewLine        get;Di2015NewLine        set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // ConstructorDi2015NewLine    public MyDataSource()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create the Persons listDi2015NewLine        Persons = new List<Person>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetChildrenCount (NSOutlineView outlineView, NSObject item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If the item is not null, return the child count of our itemDi2015NewLine        if(item != null)Di2015NewLine            return (item as Person).Children.Count;Di2015NewLine        // Its null, that means its asking for our root element count.Di2015NewLine        return Persons.Count();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override NSObject GetObjectValue (NSOutlineView outlineView, NSTableColumn forTableColumn, NSObject byItem)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Is it null? (It really shouldnt be...)Di2015NewLine        if (byItem != null) {Di2015NewLine            // Jackpot, typecast to our Person objectDi2015NewLine            var p = ((Person)byItem);Di2015NewLine            // Get the table column identifierDi2015NewLine            var ident = forTableColumn.Identifier.ToString();Di2015NewLine            // We return the appropriate information for each columnDi2015NewLine            if (ident == "colName") {Di2015NewLine                return (NSString)p.Name;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (ident == "colAge") {Di2015NewLine                return (NSString)p.Age.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Oh well.. errors dont have to be THAT depressing..Di2015NewLine        return (NSString)"Not enough jQuery";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override NSObject GetChild (NSOutlineView outlineView, int childIndex, NSObject ofItem)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If the item is null, it's asking for a root element. I had serious trouble figuring this out...Di2015NewLine        if(ofItem == null)Di2015NewLine            return Persons[childIndex];Di2015NewLine        // Return the child its asking for.Di2015NewLine        return (NSObject)((ofItem as Person).Children[childIndex]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool ItemExpandable (NSOutlineView outlineView, NSObject item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Straight forward - it wants to know if its expandable.Di2015NewLine        if(item == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        return (item as Person).Children.Count > 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12518361Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<SummaryReport> CreateReport()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine return Get()Di2015NewLine     .SelectMany(rev => rev.Assessments, (rev, ass) => new { rev, ass })Di2015NewLine     .Select(x => new SummaryReportDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         ReviewID = x.rev.ReviewID,Di2015NewLine         ReviewerID = x.ass.Reviewer.ReviewerID,Di2015NewLine         Assessment = x.ass.Assessment,Di2015NewLine         ReviewGroupID = x.ass.Reviewer.ReviewGroup.ReviewGroupID,Di2015NewLine         GroupAssessment = DeriveGroupAssessment(x.rev.Assessments)Di2015NewLine      })Di2015NewLine     .ToList();Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string DeriveGroupAssessment(IEnumerable<Assessment> assessments)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  string assessment = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (assessments.Any(a => a.AssessmentDescription == "Big Problem"))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    assessment = "Big Problem";Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  else if (assessments.All(a => a.AssessmentDescription == "No Problem"))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    assessment = "No Problem";Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // If you want the value to be null if neither of the above conditions are met, this logic is not neededDi2015NewLine  ////if (!assessments.Any(a => a.AssessmentDescription == "Big Problem")Di2015NewLine  ////    && assessments.Any(a => a.AssessmentDescription == string.Empty))Di2015NewLine  ////{Di2015NewLine  ////  assessment = null;Di2015NewLine  ////}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return assessment;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12519912Di2015UniqueSeparator[=:]      # Split on this regex...Di2015NewLine(?=       # ...only if the following matches afterwards:Di2015NewLine (?:      # The following group...Di2015NewLine  [^"]*"  #  any number of non-quote character, then one quoteDi2015NewLine  [^"]*"  #  repeat, to ensure even number of quotesDi2015NewLine )*       # ...repeated any number of times, including zero,Di2015NewLine [^"]*    # followed by any number of non-quotesDi2015NewLine $        # until the end of the string.Di2015NewLine)         # End of lookahead.Di2015NewLine

12526714Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void AddNodesRecursive(TreeNode parent, object childData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string strChildNode = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    XmlElement childDoc = null;Di2015NewLine    if (parent != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((childData as string) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parent.ChildNodes.Add(new TreeNode((childData as string)));Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        childDoc = childData as XmlElement;Di2015NewLine        if (childDoc != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TreeNode subParent = new TreeNode(childDoc.InnerText);Di2015NewLine            parent.ChildNodes.Add(subParent);Di2015NewLine            foreach (XmlElement grandChild in childDoc.ChildNodes)Di2015NewLine                AddNodesRecursive(subParent, grandChild);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12527050Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Eject(string cdDrive) {Di2015NewLine    IntPtr driveHandle = new IntPtr(INVALID_HANDLE);Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        // Open the deviceDi2015NewLine        driveHandle = CreateFile(cdDrive, GENERICREAD, FILE_SHARE_READ | FILE_SHARE_WRITE | FILE_SHARE_DELETE, IntPtr.Zero, OPENEXISTING, 0, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine        if ((int)driveHandle == INVALID_HANDLE) { throw new Win32Exception(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Try and ejectDi2015NewLine        bool ejected = DeviceIoControl(driveHandle, IOCTL_STORAGE_EJECT_MEDIA, IntPtr.Zero, 0, IntPtr.Zero, 0, ref bytesReturned, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine        if (!ejected) { throw new Win32Exception(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    } catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    } finally {Di2015NewLine        if ((int)driveHandle != INVALID_HANDLE) { CloseHandle(driveHandle); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine private static void ReplaceControlForExport(Control mainControlElement)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < mainControlElement.Controls.Count; LinkButton).Text));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (currentControl is ImageButton)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine            mainControlElement.Controls.Remove(currentControl);Di2015NewLine            mainControlElement.Controls.AddAt(i, new LiteralControl((currentControl as DropDownList).SelectedItem.Text));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (currentControl is CheckBox)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mainControlElement.Controls.Remove(currentControl);Di2015NewLine            mainControlElement.Controls.AddAt(i, new LiteralControl((currentControl as CheckBox).Checked ? "True" : "False"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Recursive CallDi2015NewLine        if (currentControl.HasControls())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ReplaceControlForExport(currentControl);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12532643Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class PaginatedList<T> : List<T> {Di2015NewLine        public int PageIndex  { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public int PageSize   { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public int TotalCount { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public int TotalPages { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public PaginatedList(IQueryable<T> source, int pageIndex, int pageSize) {Di2015NewLine             PageIndex = pageIndex;Di2015NewLine             PageSize = pageSize;Di2015NewLine             TotalCount = source.Count();Di2015NewLine             TotalPages = (int) Math.Ceiling(TotalCount / (double)PageSize);Di2015NewLine             this.AddRange(source.Skip(PageIndex * PageSize).Take(PageSize));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool HasPreviousPage {Di2015NewLine           get {Di2015NewLine              return (PageIndex > 0);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool HasNextPage {Di2015NewLine            get {Di2015NewLine               return (PageIndex+1 < TotalPages);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine

  #region UnhandledExceptionFilterAttribute()Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="UnhandledExceptionFilterAttribute"/> #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region DefaultHandlerDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets a delegate method that returns an <see cref="HttpResponseMessage"/> Di2015NewLine        /// that describes the supplied exception.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <value>Di2015NewLine        /// A <see cref="Func{Exception, HttpRequestMessage, HttpResponseMessage}"/> delegate method that returns Di2015NewLine        /// an <see cref="HttpResponseMessage"/> that describes the supplied exception.Di2015NewLine        /// </value>Di2015NewLine        private static Func<Exception, HttpRequestMessage, HttpResponseMessage> DefaultHandler = (exception, request) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(exception == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var response            = request.CreateResponse<string>(Di2015NewLine                HttpStatusCode.InternalServerError, GetContentOf(exception)Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine            response.ReasonPhrase   = exception.Message.Replace(Environment.NewLine, String.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return response;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region GetContentOfDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets a delegate method that extracts information from the specified exception.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <value>Di2015NewLine        /// A <see cref="Func{Exception, String}"/> delegate method that extracts information Di2015NewLine        /// from the specified exception.Di2015NewLine        /// </value>Di2015NewLine        private static Func<Exception, string> GetContentOf = (exception) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (exception == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return String.Empty;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var result  = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result.AppendLine(exception.Message);Di2015NewLine            result.AppendLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Exception innerException = exception.InnerException;Di2015NewLine            while (innerException != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.AppendLine(innerException.Message);Di2015NewLine                result.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine                innerException = innerException.InnerException;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #if DEBUGDi2015NewLine            result.AppendLine(exception.StackTrace);Di2015NewLine            #endifDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region HandlersDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets the exception handlers registered with this filter.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <value>Di2015NewLine        /// A <see cref="ConcurrentDictionary{Type, Tuple}"/> collection that contains Di2015NewLine        /// the exception handlers registered with this filter.Di2015NewLine        /// </value>Di2015NewLine        protected ConcurrentDictionary<Type, Tuple<HttpStatusCode?, Func<Exception, HttpRequestMessage, HttpResponseMessage>>>     private readonly ConcurrentDictionary<Type, Tuple<HttpStatusCode?, Func<Exception, HttpRequestMessage, HttpResponseMessage>>> _filterHandlers = new ConcurrentDictionary<Type, Tuple<HttpStatusCode?, Func<Exception, HttpRequestMessage, HttpResponseMessage>>>();Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region OnException(HttpActionExecutedContext actionExecutedContext)Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Raises the exception event.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="actionExecutedContext">The context for the action.</param>Di2015NewLine        public override void OnException(HttpActionExecutedContext actionExecutedContext)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(actionExecutedContext == null || actionExecutedContext.Exception == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var type    = actionExecutedContext.Exception.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Tuple<HttpStatusCode?, Func<Exception, HttpRequestMessage, HttpResponseMessage>> registration = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (this.Handlers.TryGetValue(type, out registration))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var statusCode  = registration.Item1;Di2015NewLine                var handler     = registration.Item2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var response    = handler(Di2015NewLine                    actionExecutedContext.Exception.GetBaseException(), Di2015NewLine                    actionExecutedContext.RequestDi2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Use registered status code if availableDi2015NewLine                if (statusCode.HasValue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    response.StatusCode = statusCode.Value;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                actionExecutedContext.Response  = response;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If no exception handler registered for the exception type, fallback to default handlerDi2015NewLine                actionExecutedContext.Response  = DefaultHandler(Di2015NewLine                    actionExecutedContext.Exception.GetBaseException(), actionExecutedContext.RequestDi2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Register<TException>(HttpStatusCode statusCode)Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Registers an exception handler that returns the specified status code for exceptions of type <typeparamref name="TException"/>.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine        public UnhandledExceptionFilterAttribute Register<TException>(HttpStatusCode statusCode) Di2015NewLine            where TException : ExceptionDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var type    = typeof(TException);Di2015NewLine            var item    = new Tuple<HttpStatusCode?, Func<Exception, HttpRequestMessage, HttpResponseMessage>>(Di2015NewLine                statusCode, DefaultHandlerDi2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!this.Handlers.TryAdd(type, item))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Tuple<HttpStatusCode?, Func<Exception, HttpRequestMessage, HttpResponseMessage>> oldItem = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (this.Handlers.TryRemove(type, out oldItem))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.Handlers.TryAdd(type, item);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return this;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Register<TException>(Func<Exception, HttpRequestMessage, HttpResponseMessage> handler)Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Registers the specified exception <paramref name="handler"/> for exceptions of type            }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return skip;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var count=0,scL=0,scT=0,scBL=0,scBT=0;Di2015NewLine    var 12535829Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static DbConnection CreateConnectionWrapper(string nameOrConnectionString) {Di2015NewLine    var providerInvariantName = "System.Data.SqlClient";Di2015NewLine    var connectionString = nameOrConnectionString;Di2015NewLine    //name=connectionName formatDi2015NewLine    var index = nameOrConnectionString.IndexOf('=');Di2015NewLine    if (nameOrConnectionString.Substring(0, index).Trim()Di2015NewLine        .Equals("name", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        nameOrConnectionString = nameOrConnectionStringDi2015NewLine            .Substring(index + 1).Trim();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //look up connection string nameDi2015NewLine    var connectionStringSetting =Di2015NewLine        ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings[nameOrConnectionString];Di2015NewLine    if (connectionStringSetting != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        providerInvariantName = connectionStringSetting.ProviderName;Di2015NewLine        connectionString = connectionStringSetting.ConnectionString;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //create the special connection string with the provider name in itDi2015NewLine    var wrappedConnectionString = "wrappedProvider=" + Di2015NewLine        providerInvariantName + ";" + Di2015NewLine        connectionString;Di2015NewLine    //create the tracing wrapperDi2015NewLine    var connection = new EFTracingConnectionDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                ConnectionString = wrappedConnectionStringDi2015NewLine                            };Di2015NewLine    //hook up logging hereDi2015NewLine    connection.CommandFinished +=Di2015NewLine        (sender, args) => Console.WriteLine(args.ToTraceString());Di2015NewLine    return connection; }Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static ConcurrentDictionary<Guid, Transaction> _transactions = new ConcurrentDictionary<Guid, Transaction>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// transaction);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return response indicating request has been accepted fro processingDi2015NewLine        return this.Request.CreateResponse<Transaction>(HttpStatusCode.Accepted, transaction);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Used to retrieve status of 12539038Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Globalization;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class RegexUtilitiesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   bool invalid = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public bool IsValidEmail(string strIn)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       invalid = false;Di2015NewLine       if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(strIn))Di2015NewLine          return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // Use IdnMapping class to convert Unicode domain names.Di2015NewLine       strIn = Regex.Replace(strIn, @"(@)(.+)$", this.DomainMapper);Di2015NewLine       if (invalid) Di2015NewLine          return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // Return true if strIn is in valid e-mail format.Di2015NewLine       return Regex.IsMatch(strIn, Di2015NewLine              @"^(?("")(""[^""]+?""@)|(([0-9a-z]((\\.(?!\\.))|[-!#\\$%&'\\*\\+/=\\?\\^`\\{\\}\\|~\\w])*)(?<=[0-9a-z])@))" + Di2015NewLine              @"(?(\\[)(\\[(\\d{1,3}\\.){3}\\d{1,3}\\])|(([0-9a-z][-\\w]*[0-9a-z]*\\.)+[a-z0-9]{2,17}))$", Di2015NewLine              RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   private string DomainMapper(Match match)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      // IdnMapping class with default property values.Di2015NewLine      IdnMapping idn = new IdnMapping();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      string domainName = match.Groups[2].Value;Di2015NewLine      try {Di2015NewLine         domainName = idn.GetAscii(domainName);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch (ArgumentException) {Di2015NewLine         invalid = true;      Di2015NewLine      }      Di2015NewLine      return match.Groups[1].Value + domainName;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12539967Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct Optional<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public readonly bool ValueProvided;Di2015NewLine    public readonly T Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Optional( T value )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.ValueProvided = true;Di2015NewLine        this.Value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Optional<T>( T value )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Optional<T>( value );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12539967Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class OptionalJsonConverter<T> : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static OptionalJsonConverter<T> Instance = new OptionalJsonConverter<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson( JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var optional = (Optional<T>)value; // Cast so we can access the Optional<T> membersDi2015NewLine        serializer.Serialize( writer, optional.Value );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson( JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var valueType = objectType.GetGenericArguments()[ 0 ];Di2015NewLine        var innerValue = (T)serializer.Deserialize( reader, valueType );Di2015NewLine        return (Optional<T>)innerValue; // Explicitly invoke the conversion from T to Optional<T>Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert( Type objectType )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return objectType == typeof( Optional<T> );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12539967Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomContractResolver : DefaultContractResolverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // For deserialization. Detect when the type is being deserialized and set the converter for it.Di2015NewLine    public override JsonContract ResolveContract( Type type )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var contract = base.ResolveContract( type );Di2015NewLine        if( contract.Converter == null && type.IsGenericType && type.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof( Optional<> ) )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // This may look fancy but it's just calling GetOptionalJsonConverter<T> with the correct TDi2015NewLine            var optionalValueType = type.GetGenericArguments()[ 0 ];Di2015NewLine            var genericMethod = this.GetAndMakeGenericMethod( "GetOptionalJsonConverter", optionalValueType );Di2015NewLine            var converter = (JsonConverter)genericMethod.Invoke( null, null );Di2015NewLine            // Set the converter for the typeDi2015NewLine            contract.Converter = converter;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return contract;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static OptionalJsonConverter<T> GetOptionalJsonConverter<T>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return OptionalJsonConverter<T>.Instance;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // For serialization. Detect when we're creating a JsonProperty for an Optional<T> member and modify it accordingly.Di2015NewLine    protected override JsonProperty CreateProperty( MemberInfo member, MemberSerialization memberSerialization )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var jsonProperty = base.CreateProperty( member, memberSerialization );Di2015NewLine        var type = jsonProperty.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine        if( type.IsGenericType && type.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof( Optional<> ) )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // This may look fancy but it's just calling SetJsonPropertyValuesForOptionalMember<T> with the correct TDi2015NewLine            var optionalValueType = type.GetGenericArguments()[ 0 ];Di2015NewLine            var genericMethod = this.GetAndMakeGenericMethod( "SetJsonPropertyValuesForOptionalMember", optionalValueType );Di2015NewLine            genericMethod.Invoke( null, new object[]{ member.Name, jsonProperty } );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return jsonProperty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void SetJsonPropertyValuesForOptionalMember<T>( string memberName, JsonProperty jsonProperty )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if( jsonProperty.ShouldSerialize == null ) // Honor ShouldSerialize*Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            jsonProperty.ShouldSerialize =Di2015NewLine                ( declaringObject ) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if( jsonProperty.GetIsSpecified != null && jsonProperty.GetIsSpecified( declaringObject ) ) // Honor *SpecifiedDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return true;Di2015NewLine                    }                    Di2015NewLine                    object optionalValue;Di2015NewLine                    if( !TryGetPropertyValue( declaringObject, memberName, out optionalValue ) &&Di2015NewLine                        !TryGetFieldValue( declaringObject, memberName, out optionalValue ) )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        throw new InvalidOperationException( "Better error message here" );Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    return ( (Optional<T>)optionalValue ).ValueProvided;Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if( jsonProperty.Converter == null )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            jsonProperty.Converter = CustomContractResolver.GetOptionalJsonConverter<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Utility methods used in this classDi2015NewLine    private MethodInfo GetAndMakeGenericMethod( string methodName, params Type[] typeArguments )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var method = this.GetType().GetMethod( methodName, BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Static );Di2015NewLine        return method.MakeGenericMethod( typeArguments );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool TryGetPropertyValue( object declaringObject, string propertyName, out object value )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var propertyInfo = declaringObject.GetType().GetProperty( propertyName, BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance );Di2015NewLine        if( propertyInfo == null )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = null;Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        value = propertyInfo.GetValue( declaringObject, BindingFlags.GetProperty, null, null, null );Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool TryGetFieldValue( object declaringObject, string fieldName, out object value )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var fieldInfo = declaringObject.GetType().GetField( fieldName, BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance );Di2015NewLine        if( fieldInfo == null )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = null;Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        value = fieldInfo.GetValue( declaringObject );Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12542028Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<int> Foo(int x) {Di2015NewLine  string s = x.ToString();Di2015NewLine  for (int length = 1; length <= s.Length; length++) {Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i + length < s.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine      yield return int.Parse(s.Substring(i, length));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12542091Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static SelectList ToSelectList<TEnum>(this TEnum enumObj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var enumType = typeof(TEnum);Di2015NewLine        if (enumType.IsGenericType && enumType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            enumType = enumType.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var fields = enumType.GetFields(Di2015NewLine            BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.GetField | BindingFlags.PublicDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine        var values = Enum.GetValues(enumType).OfType<TEnum>();Di2015NewLine        var items =Di2015NewLine            from value in valuesDi2015NewLine            from field in fieldsDi2015NewLine            let xmlEnumAttribute = fieldDi2015NewLine                .GetCustomAttributes(Di2015NewLine                    typeof(XmlEnumAttribute), trueDi2015NewLine                )Di2015NewLine                .OfType<XmlEnumAttribute>()Di2015NewLine                .FirstOrDefault()Di2015NewLine            let name = (xmlEnumAttribute != null)Di2015NewLine                ? xmlEnumAttribute.NameDi2015NewLine                : value.ToString()Di2015NewLine            where value.ToString() == field.NameDi2015NewLine            select new { Id = value, Name = name };Di2015NewLine        return new SelectList(items, "Id", "Name", enumObj);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12544159Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string DotFormatToRowKey(this string dotFormatRowKey) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (dotFormatRowKey == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("dotFormatRowKey");    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // maybe @"^\\d\\d?\\.\\d\\d?$" is a beter regex. Di2015NewLine    // accept only 1|2 digits and nothing before|afterDi2015NewLine    if (! Regex.IsMatch(dotFormatRowKey, @"\\d+\\.\\d+"))  Di2015NewLine       throw new ArgumentException("Expected ##.##, was " + dotFormatRowKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var splits = dotFormatRowKey.Split('.')Di2015NewLine                 .Select(x => String.Format("{0:d2}", Int32.Parse(x)))Di2015NewLine                 .ToList();  // ToList() is never neededDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ToArray() not needed in Fx >= 4.0Di2015NewLine    return String.Join(String.Empty, splits.ToArray()); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12544523Di2015UniqueSeparator// try to pack the aleles together spaced apart by 1.0Di2015NewLine// returns the standard deviation of the samples from 1.0Di2015NewLinestatic float Eval_OrderedDistance(Chromosome c) {Di2015NewLine    float sum = 0;Di2015NewLine    int n = c.alele.Length;Di2015NewLine    for(int i=1; i<n; i++) {Di2015NewLine        float diff = (c.alele[i] - c.alele[i-1]) - 1.0f; Di2015NewLine        sum += diff*diff; // variance from 1.0Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (float)Math.Sqrt(sum/n);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12544523Di2015UniqueSeparatorChromosome ChangeOne(Chromosome c) {Di2015NewLine    Chromosome d = c.Clone();Di2015NewLine    int i = rand.Next() % d.alele.Length;Di2015NewLine    d.alele[i] = (float)(rand.NextDouble()*2000-1000);Di2015NewLine    return d;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12544523Di2015UniqueSeparator// compute the population standard deviationDi2015NewLinepublic float StdDev(Chromosome other) {Di2015NewLine    float sum = 0.0f;Di2015NewLine    for(int i=0; i<alele.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        float diff = other.alele[i] - alele[i];Di2015NewLine        sum += diff*diff;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (float)Math.Sqrt(sum);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12544523Di2015UniqueSeparator// returns: total number of niches in this populationDi2015NewLine// max_stddev -- any two chromosomes with population stddev less than this maxDi2015NewLine//               will be grouped togetherDi2015NewLineint ComputeNiches(float max_stddev) {Di2015NewLine    List<int> niches = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // clear nichesDi2015NewLine    foreach(var c in population) {Di2015NewLine        c.niche = -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // calculate nichesDi2015NewLine    for(int i=0; i<population.Count; i++) {Di2015NewLine        var c = population[i];Di2015NewLine        if( c.niche != -1) continue; // niche already setDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // compute the niche by finding the stddev between the two chromosomes Di2015NewLine        c.niche = niches.Count;Di2015NewLine        int count_in_niche = 1; // includes the curent ChromosomeDi2015NewLine        for(int j=i+1; j<population.Count; j++) {Di2015NewLine            var d = population[j];Di2015NewLine            float stddev = c.StdDev(d);Di2015NewLine            if(stddev < max_stddev) {Di2015NewLine                d.niche = c.niche; // same nicheDi2015NewLine                ++count_in_niche;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        niches.Add(count_in_niche);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // penalize Chromosomes by their niche sizeDi2015NewLine    foreach(var c in population) {Di2015NewLine        c.niche_scaled_fitness = c.scaled_fitness / niches[c.niche];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return niches.Count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12544523Di2015UniqueSeparatorsum = 0Di2015NewLinefor(...) {Di2015NewLine    sum += value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineaverage = sum / count;Di2015NewLine

12548234Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void FillBuffer(short[] buffer, int sampleRate, double frequency)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double totalTime = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < buffer.Length - 1; i += 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double time = (double)totalTime / (double)sampleRate;Di2015NewLine            short currentSample = (short)(Math.Sin(2 * Math.PI * frequency * time) * (double)short.MaxValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            buffer[i] = currentSample; //(short)(currentSample & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            buffer[i + 1] = currentSample; //(short)(currentSample >> 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            totalTime += 2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12551408Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  class ProgramDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      string txt="1Dept Neurosci, The Univ. of New Mexico, ALBUQUERQUE, NM ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      string re1="(\\\\d+)";  // Integer Number 1Di2015NewLine      string re2="((?:[a-z][a-z]+))";   // Word 1Di2015NewLine      string re3=".*?"; // Non-greedy match on fillerDi2015NewLine      string re4="((?:[a-z][a-z]+))";   // Word 2Di2015NewLine      string re5="(,)"; // Any Single Character 1Di2015NewLine      string re6="(.*?),";  // Command Seperated Values 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Regex r = new Regex(re1+re2+re3+re4+re5+re6,RegexOptions.IgnoreCase|RegexOptions.Singleline);Di2015NewLine      Match m = r.Match(txt);Di2015NewLine      if (m.Success)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine            String int1=m.Groups[1].ToString();Di2015NewLine            String word1=m.Groups[2].ToString();Di2015NewLine            String word2=m.Groups[3].ToString();Di2015NewLine            String c1=m.Groups[4].ToString();Di2015NewLine            String csv1=m.Groups[5].ToString();Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("("+int1.ToString()+")"+"("+word1.ToString()+")"+"("+word2.ToString()+")"+"("+c1.ToString()+")"+"("+csv1.ToString()+")"+"\\n");Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12551408Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  class ProgramDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      string txt="X. 12552079Di2015UniqueSeparator // Each blessed API will be annotated with a "__DynamicallyInvokableAttribute".Di2015NewLine // This "__DynamicallyInvokableAttribute" is a type defined in its own assembly.Di2015NewLine // So the ctor is always a MethodDef and the type a TypeDef.Di2015NewLine // We cache this ctor MethodDef token for faster custom attribute lookup.Di2015NewLine // If this attribute type doesn't exist in the assembly, it means the assemblyDi2015NewLine // doesn't contain any blessed APIs.Di2015NewLine Type invocableAttribute = GetType("__DynamicallyInvokableAttribute", false);Di2015NewLine if (invocableAttribute != null)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine     Contract.Assert(((MetadataToken)invocableAttribute.MetadataToken).IsTypeDef);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     ConstructorInfo ctor = invocableAttribute.GetConstructor(Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLine     Contract.Assert(ctor != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     int token = ctor.MetadataToken;Di2015NewLine     Contract.Assert(((MetadataToken)token).IsMethodDef);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     flags |= (ASSEMBLY_FLAGS)token & ASSEMBLY_FLAGS.ASSEMBLY_FLAGS_TOKEN_MASK;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

12556724Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static HtmlString DescriptionFor(this Enum theEnum)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var theEnumType = theEnum.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //the enum must inherit from Enum, but not actually *be* Enum.Di2015NewLine    if (!(theEnum is Enum) || theEnumType.Equals(typeof(Enum))) throw new ArgumentException("Not a valid Enumeration.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var fi = theEnumType.GetField(theEnum.ToString());Di2015NewLine    var displayAttribute = ((DisplayAttribute[])fi.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DisplayAttribute), false))Di2015NewLine        .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (displayAttribute == null) return new HtmlString(theEnum.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new HtmlString(displayAttribute.Description ?? theEnum.ToString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
