12556931Di2015UniqueSeparatorsearch
12556931Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic public Expression<Func<T, bool>> GetComparison<T>(T search)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "t");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var props = from p in typeof(T).GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                where p.CanRead && !IsDefault(p.GetValue(search, null))Di2015NewLine                select Expression.Equal(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Property(param, p.Name),Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Constant(p.GetValue(search, null))Di2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var expr = props.Aggregate((a, b) => Expression.AndAlso(a, b));Di2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(expr, param);         Di2015NewLine    return lambda;Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

12558023Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int X25_INIT_CRC = 0xffff;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static ushort crc_accumulate(byte b, ushort crc)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    uncheckedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte ch = (byte)(b ^ (byte)(crc & 0x00ff));Di2015NewLine        ch = (byte)(ch ^ (ch << 4));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (ushort)((crc >> 8) ^ (ch << 8) ^ (ch << 3) ^ (ch >> 4));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static ushort crc_calculate(byte[] pBuffer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ushort crcTmp = X25_INIT_CRC;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < pBuffer.Length; i++) // skips header UDi2015NewLine        crcTmp = crc_accumulate(pBuffer[i], crcTmp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return crcTmp;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12559600Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Transition<TState, TCommand>Di2015NewLine    : IEquatable<Transition<TState, TCommand>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // I assume in reality these are properties?Di2015NewLine    TState From = default(TState);Di2015NewLine    TState To  = default(TState);Di2015NewLine    TCommand Command = default(TCommand);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Equals(other as Transition<TState, TCommand>);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(Transition<TState, TCommand> other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (other == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return From.Equals(other.From) &&Di2015NewLine               To.Equals(other.To) &&Di2015NewLine               Command.Equals(other.Command);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int hash = 17;Di2015NewLine        hash = hash * 31 + From.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        hash = hash * 31 + To.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        hash = hash * 31 + Command.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12564585Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<Image> GetAllFrames(Stream sm)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<Image> images = new List<Image>();Di2015NewLine            Bitmap bitmap = new Bitmap(sm);Di2015NewLine            int count = bitmap.GetFrameCount(FrameDimension.Page);Di2015NewLine            for (int idx = 0; idx < count; idx++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bitmap.SelectActiveFrame(FrameDimension.Page, idx);Di2015NewLine                MemoryStream byteStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine                bitmap.Save(byteStream, ImageFormat.Tiff);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                images.Add(Image.FromStream(byteStream));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return images;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

12577841Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Recognize(Bitmap bitmap)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bitmap.Save("temp.png", ImageFormat.Png);Di2015NewLine    var startInfo = new ProcessStartInfo("tesseract.exe", "temp.png temp hocr");Di2015NewLine    startInfo.WindowStyle = ProcessWindowStyle.Hidden;Di2015NewLine    var process = Process.Start(startInfo);Di2015NewLine    process.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    GetWords(File.ReadAllText("temp.html"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Futher actions with wordsDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic Dictionary<Rectangle, string> GetWords(string tesseractHtml)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var xml = XDocument.Parse(tesseractHtml);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var rectsWords = new Dictionary<System.Drawing.Rectangle, string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var ocr_words = xml.Descendants("span").Where(element => element.Attribute("class").Value == "ocr_word").ToList();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var ocr_word in ocr_words)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var strs = ocr_word.Attribute("title").Value.Split(' ');Di2015NewLine        int left = int.Parse(strs[1]);Di2015NewLine        int top = int.Parse(strs[2]);Di2015NewLine        int width = int.Parse(strs[3]) - left + 1;Di2015NewLine        int height = int.Parse(strs[4]) - top + 1;Di2015NewLine        rectsWords.Add(new Rectangle(left, top, width, height), ocr_word.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return rectsWords;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine        public int CategoryId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int SubCategoryId { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public CategoryField(Field innerField) : base(innerField)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Assert.ArgumentNotNull(innerField, "innerField");Di2015NewLine            var pair = CategoryFieldParser.Parse(innerField.Value);Di2015NewLine            CategoryId = pair.CategoryId;Di2015NewLine            SubCategoryId = pair.SubCategoryId;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static implicit operator CategoryField(Field field)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (field != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return new CategoryField(field);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class CategoryFieldParserDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static CategoryIdPair Parse(string input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var pair = input.Split(new[] { '|' });Di2015NewLine            return new CategoryIdPairDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        CategoryId = pair.Length > 0 ? GetIntValue(pair[0]) : CategoryIdPair.Empty.CategoryId,Di2015NewLine                        SubCategoryId = pair.Length == 2 ? GetIntValue(pair[1]) : CategoryIdPair.Empty.SubCategoryIdDi2015NewLine                    };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static int GetIntValue(string input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int result;Di2015NewLine            if (int.TryParse(input, out result))Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class CategoryIdPairDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int CategoryId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int SubCategoryId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public static CategoryIdPair EmptyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return new CategoryIdPair {CategoryId = 0, SubCategoryId = 0}; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12583398Di2015UniqueSeparatorAnd
12583398Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected Expression<Func<BaseObject, bool>> CreatePropertiesEqualExpression(BaseObject other)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (! other.GetType().IsSubclassOf(this.GetType())) throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var properties = this.GetType().GetProperties();Di2015NewLine    Expression trueExpr = Expression.Constant(true);Di2015NewLine    Expression thisExpr = Expression.Constant(this);Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression paramExpr = Expression.Parameter(typeof(BaseObject), "compareTo");Di2015NewLine    Expression downCastExpr = Expression.Convert(paramExpr, other.GetType());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MethodInfo eqMethod = typeof(object).GetMethod("Equals", BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Static);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression propCompExpr = properties.Aggregate(trueExpr, (expr, prop) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression thisPropExpr = Expression.Property(thisExpr, prop);Di2015NewLine        Expression compPropExpr = Expression.Property(downCastExpr, prop);Di2015NewLine        Expression eqExpr = Expression.Call(null, eqMethod, Expression.Convert(thisPropExpr, typeof(object)), Expression.Convert(compPropExpr, typeof(object)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.And(expr, eqExpr);Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<BaseObject, bool>>(propCompExpr, paramExpr);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12583398Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SubObject : BaseObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    private Func<BaseObject, bool> eqFunc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsEqualTo(SubObject other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(this.eqFunc == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var compExpr = this.CreatePropertiesEqualExpression(other);Di2015NewLine            this.eqFunc = compExpr.Compile();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return this.eqFunc(other);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12585704Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class ucSignature : UserControlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ucSignature()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void inkCanvas1_LostMouseCapture(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        using (var ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            inkCanvas1.Strokes.Save(ms);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in ms.ToArray())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.AppendFormat("{0},", item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            ms.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var local = sb.ToString().Trim() + "¬¬¬";Di2015NewLine        local = local.Replace(",¬¬¬", string.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.SetValue(SignatureProperty, local);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void LoadSignature(string signatureIn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(signatureIn) || !signatureIn.Contains(",")) return;Di2015NewLine        var x = signatureIn.Split(',').Select(byte.Parse).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        if (!x.Any()) return;Di2015NewLine        using (var ms = new MemoryStream(x))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine 12589550Di2015UniqueSeparator// backColor is an INT representation of color at fillPoint in the beginning.Di2015NewLine// result in pixels of enclosed shape.Di2015NewLineprivate int GetFillSize(Bitmap b, Point fillPoint)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   int count = 0;Di2015NewLine   Point p;Di2015NewLine   Stack pixels = new Stack();Di2015NewLine   var backColor = b.GetPixel(fillPoint.X, fillPoint.Y);Di2015NewLine   pixels.Push(fillPoint);Di2015NewLine   while (pixels.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       count++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       p = (Point)pixels.Pop();Di2015NewLine       b.SetPixel(p.X, p.Y, backColor);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if (b.GetPixel(p.X - 1, p.Y).ToArgb() == backColor)Di2015NewLine           pixels.Push(new Point(p.X - 1, p.Y));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if (b.GetPixel(p.X, p.Y - 1).ToArgb() == backColor)Di2015NewLine           pixels.Push(new Point(p.X, p.Y - 1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if (b.GetPixel(p.X + 1, p.Y).ToArgb() == backColor)Di2015NewLine           pixels.Push(new Point(p.X + 1, p.Y));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if (b.GetPixel(p.X, p.Y + 1).ToArgb() == backColor)Di2015NewLine           pixels.Push(new Point(p.X, p.Y + 1));Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12589550Di2015UniqueSeparator// offset points initialization.Di2015NewLinePoint[] Offsets = new Point[]Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    new Point(-1, -1),Di2015NewLine    new Point(-0, -1),Di2015NewLine    new Point(+1, -1),Di2015NewLine    new Point(+1, -0),Di2015NewLine    new Point(+1, +1),Di2015NewLine    new Point(+0, +1),Di2015NewLine    new Point(-1, +1),Di2015NewLine    new Point(-1, +0),Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate int Fill(Bitmap b, Point fillPoint)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    Point p;Di2015NewLine    Stack<Point> pixels = new Stack<Point>();Di2015NewLine    var backColor = b.GetPixel(fillPoint.X, fillPoint.Y).ToArgb();Di2015NewLine    pixels.Push(fillPoint);Di2015NewLine    while (pixels.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        p = (Point)pixels.Pop();Di2015NewLine        b.SetPixel(p.X, p.Y, Color.FromArgb(backColor));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var offset in Offsets)Di2015NewLine            if (b.GetPixel(p.X + offset.X, p.Y + offset.Y).ToArgb() == backColor)Di2015NewLine                pixels.Push(new Point(p.X + offset.X, p.Y + offset.Y));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12592155Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction CreatePasswordHash($_password, $_salt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    $saltAndPwd = $_password . $_salt;Di2015NewLine    $hashedPwd = hash('sha512', $saltAndPwd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $hex_strs = str_split($hashedPwd,2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach($hex_strs as &$hex) {Di2015NewLine        $hex = preg_replace('/^0/', '', $hex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    $hashedPwd = implode('', $hex_strs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return strtoupper($hashedPwd);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12604014Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Enter the string you want to search within.");Di2015NewLine            string hayStack = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Enter the string you want to search for.");Di2015NewLine            string needle = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var ps = new PatternSearch<char>(needle.ToCharArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(hayStack);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var matches = ps.Matches(hayStack.ToCharArray()).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < hayStack.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(matches.Contains(i) ? "↑" : " ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Implements a pattern searching algorithm with <b>O(nm)</b> worst-case performance.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The data type of the array to search.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    public class PatternSearch<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private struct MatchInfoDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public MatchInfo(int startIndex, int matchLength)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.StartIndex = startIndex;Di2015NewLine                this.MatchLength = matchLength;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            public int StartIndex;Di2015NewLine            public int MatchLength;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private IEnumerable<T> pattern;Di2015NewLine        private List<MatchInfo> found;Di2015NewLine        private Func<T, T, bool> eqComp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //optimization for IEnumerables that do not implement IListDi2015NewLine        int patLen = -1;Di2015NewLine        int seqLen = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="PatternSearch{T}" /> class.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="pattern">The pattern that will be searched for.</param>Di2015NewLine        public PatternSearch(T[] pattern) : this(pattern, (x, y) => x.Equals(y)) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="PatternSearch{T}"/> class with the specified equality comparer.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="pattern">The pattern to be searched for.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="equalityComparer">The equality comparer to use for matching elements in the array.</param>Di2015NewLine        public PatternSearch(T[] pattern, Func<T, T, bool> equalityComparer)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            patLen = pattern.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (pattern == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("pattern", "The search pattern cannot be null.");Di2015NewLine            if (equalityComparer == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("equalityComparer", "The equality comparer cannot be null.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (patLen <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("pattern", "The pattern cannot be empty.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // assign the valuesDi2015NewLine            this.pattern = pattern;Di2015NewLine            found = new List<MatchInfo>();Di2015NewLine            eqComp = equalityComparer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns the start index of all occurrences of the search pattern within the specified array.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="seq">The larger sequence to find occurrences of the search pattern within.</param>Di2015NewLine        public IEnumerable<int> Matches(IEnumerable<T> seq)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            seqLen = seqLen == -1 ? seq.Count() : seqLen;Di2015NewLine            return this.Matches(seq, 0, seqLen);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns the start index of all occurrences of the search pattern within the specified array.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="seq">The larger sequence to find occurrences of the search pattern within.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="startIndex">The index in <paramref name="seq"/> to start searching at.</param>Di2015NewLine        public IEnumerable<int> Matches(IEnumerable<T> seq, int startIndex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            seqLen = seqLen == -1 ? seq.Count() : seqLen;Di2015NewLine            return this.Matches(seq, startIndex, seqLen);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns the start index of all occurrences of the search pattern within the specified array.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="seq">The larger sequence to find occurrences of the search pattern within.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="count">The maximum number of items in <paramref name="seq"/> to match.</param>Di2015NewLine        public IEnumerable<int> Matches(IEnumerable<T> seq, int startIndex, int count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            patLen = patLen == -1 ? pattern.Count() : patLen;Di2015NewLine            seqLen = seqLen == -1 ? seq.Count() : seqLen;Di2015NewLine            bool addedNew = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var endPoint = Math.Min(seqLen, startIndex + count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (seq == null ||                      // sequence cannot be nullDi2015NewLine                seqLen < patLen ||                  // pattern cannot be longer than sequenceDi2015NewLine                (endPoint - startIndex) < patLen)   // start to end cannot be less than patternDi2015NewLine                yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = startIndex; i < endPoint; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                addedNew = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // add the first item if a match is foundDi2015NewLine                if (eqComp(seq.ElementAt(i), pattern.ElementAt(0)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (patLen == 1)Di2015NewLine                        yield return i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    found.Add(new MatchInfo(i, 1));Di2015NewLine                    addedNew = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // check incomplete matchesDi2015NewLine                for (int m = found.Count - 1; m >= 0; m--)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //skip the last item addedDi2015NewLine                    if (addedNew && m == found.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    var match = found[m];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // check incomplete matchesDi2015NewLine                    if ((i - match.StartIndex < patLen) &&Di2015NewLine                        eqComp(seq.ElementAt(i), pattern.ElementAt(match.MatchLength)))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        match.MatchLength += 1;Di2015NewLine                        found[m] = match;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // determine if a complete match has been foundDi2015NewLine                        if (match.MatchLength == patLen)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            yield return match.StartIndex;Di2015NewLine                            found.RemoveAt(m);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        found.RemoveAt(m);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12606506Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void PostProcessData(ref DataTable dataTable)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Convert byte[] columns.Di2015NewLine    List<DataColumn> colCollRem = new List<DataColumn>();Di2015NewLine    List<DataColumn> colCollAdd = new List<DataColumn>();Di2015NewLine    foreach(DataColumn col in dataTable.Columns)Di2015NewLine        if (col.DataType == typeof(byte[]))Di2015NewLine            colCollRem.Add(col);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Remove old add new.Di2015NewLine    foreach (DataColumn col in colCollRem)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int tmpOrd = col.Ordinal;Di2015NewLine        string colName = String.Format("{0}(Hex)", col.ColumnName);Di2015NewLine        DataColumn tmpCol = new DataColumn(colName, typeof(String));Di2015NewLine        dataTable.Columns.Add(tmpCol);Di2015NewLine        colCollAdd.Add(tmpCol);Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataRow row in dataTable.Rows)Di2015NewLine            row[tmpCol] = Utilities.ByteArrayToHexString((byte[])row[col]);Di2015NewLine        dataTable.Columns.Remove(col);Di2015NewLine        string colNameNew = colName.Replace("(Hex)", String.Empty);Di2015NewLine        dataTable.Columns[colName].ColumnName = colNameNew;Di2015NewLine        dataTable.Columns[colNameNew].SetOrdinal(tmpOrd);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12606506Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ByteArrayToHexString(byte[] p)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte b;Di2015NewLine    char[] c = new char[p.Length * 2 + 2];Di2015NewLine    c[0] = '0'; c[1] = 'x';Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0, x = 2; y < p.Length; ++y, ++x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        b = ((byte)(p[y] >> 4));Di2015NewLine        c[x] = (char)(b > 9 ? b + 0x37 : b + 0x30);Di2015NewLine        b = ((byte)(p[y] & 0xF));Di2015NewLine        c[++x] = (char)(b > 9 ? b + 0x37 : b + 0x30);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new string(c);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12615009Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass MySampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create the source, if it does not already exist. Di2015NewLine        if (!EventLog.SourceExists("MySource"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             //An event log source should not be created and immediately used. Di2015NewLine             //There is a latency time to enable the source, it should be created Di2015NewLine             //prior to executing the application that uses the source. Di2015NewLine             //Execute this sample a second time to use the new source.Di2015NewLine             EventLog.CreateEventSource("MySource", "MyNewLog");Di2015NewLine             Console.WriteLine("CreatedEventSource");Di2015NewLine             Console.WriteLine("Exiting, execute the application a second time to use the source.");Di2015NewLine            // The source is created.  Exit the application to allow it to be registered. Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Create an EventLog instance and assign its source.Di2015NewLine        EventLog myLog = new EventLog();Di2015NewLine        myLog.Source = "MySource";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Write an informational entry to the event log.    Di2015NewLine        myLog.WriteEntry("Writing to event log.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12615009Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class EventLoggerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const string logName = "Application";Di2015NewLine    private static string appName = "";Di2015NewLine    private static bool sourceExists = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string AppNameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return appName; }Di2015NewLine        set { appName = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Init(string appName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AppName = appName;Di2015NewLine        sourceExists = EventLog.SourceExists(AppName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!sourceExists)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            EventLog.CreateEventSource(AppName, logName);Di2015NewLine            sourceExists = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Write(string entry, EventLogEntryType logType, int eventID)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (sourceExists)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            EventLog.WriteEntry(AppName, entry, logType, eventID);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Warning(string entry) { Write(entry, EventLogEntryType.Warning, 200); }Di2015NewLine    public static void Warning(string entry, int eventID) { Write(entry, EventLogEntryType.Warning, eventID); }Di2015NewLine    public static void Error(string entry) { Write(entry, EventLogEntryType.Error, 300); }Di2015NewLine    public static void Error(string entry, int eventID) { Write(entry, EventLogEntryType.Error, eventID); }Di2015NewLine    public static void Info(string entry) { Write(entry, EventLogEntryType.Information, 100); }Di2015NewLine    public static void Info(string entry, int eventID) { Write(entry, EventLogEntryType.Information, eventID); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12620633Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void readDataInt<T>(string value, ref T[][] data, ref DateTime[] timeframe, ref DateTime[] date)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string inputFile = "D:\\\\temp.csv";Di2015NewLine        string[][] temp = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(inputFile))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] proRataVolumeFile = File.ReadAllLines(inputFile);Di2015NewLine            temp = new string[proRataVolumeFile.Length][];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < proRataVolumeFile.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                temp[i] = proRataVolumeFile[i].Split(',');Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        date = new DateTime[temp.Length - 1];Di2015NewLine        timeframe = new DateTime[temp[0].Length - 1];Di2015NewLine        data = new T[temp.Length - 1][];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < temp.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            data[i - 1] = new T[temp[i].Length - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int j = 1; j < temp[i].Length; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (temp[i][j].Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                    data[i - 1][j - 1] = (T)((IConvertible)temp[i][j]).ToType(typeof(T),Di2015NewLine                        System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < temp.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            date[i - 1] = DateTime.Parse(temp[i][0]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int j = 1; j < temp[0].Length; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            timeframe[j - 1] = DateTime.Parse(temp[0][j]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12624526Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Encode(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes;Di2015NewLine    using (var sr = new StreamReader(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var text = sr.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        bytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(text);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    using (var sw = new StreamWriter(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (byte b in bytes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sw.WriteLine(b);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Decode(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var data = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLine    using (var sr = new StreamReader(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string line;Di2015NewLine        while((line = sr.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine            data.Add(Byte.Parse(line));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    using (var sw = new StreamWriter(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sw.Write(Encoding.UTF8.GetString(data.ToArray()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12624997Di2015UniqueSeparatorIf the component's asynchronous worker code assigns an exception to the Error property or sets the Cancelled property to true, the property will raise an exception if a client tries to read its value.

12627589Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic int Add(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int ans = x + y;  // evaluates ans = x + y = 2 + 20 = 22Di2015NewLine     x = 20;          // here ans = 22, x = 20, y = 20Di2015NewLine     y = 40;          // here ans = 22, x = 20, y = 40Di2015NewLine     return ans;      // returns ans which is still 22 since x & y are independentDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12629280Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void barreader_method()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    barreader.OpenPort(barport, 19200);Di2015NewLine    byte TagType;Di2015NewLine    byte[] TagSerial = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine    byte ReturnCode = 0;Di2015NewLine    string bartagno;Di2015NewLine    List<Tuple<DateTime, String>> previoustags = new List<Tuple<DateTime, String>>();Di2015NewLine    DateTime lastreaddt = DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bartagno = "";Di2015NewLine        while (!barreader.CMD_SelectTag(out TagType, out TagSerial, out ReturnCode))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bartagno += TagSerial[i].ToString("X2");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (DateTime.Now - lastreaddt > TimeSpan.FromMinutes(1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            previoustags.Clear();Di2015NewLine            barprocess(bartagno);Di2015NewLine            previoustags.Add(Tuple.Create(DateTime.Now, bartagno));Di2015NewLine            lastreaddt = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!previoustags.Exists(a => a.Item2.Equals(bartagno)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                barprocess(bartagno);Di2015NewLine                previoustags.Add(Tuple.Create(DateTime.Now, bartagno));Di2015NewLine                lastreaddt = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        previoustags.RemoveAll(a => a.Item1.CompareTo(DateTime.Now - TimeSpan.FromMinutes(1)) < 0);Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(1200);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12631304Di2015UniqueSeparator//order-specific equality; true only if equal items are in the same orderDi2015NewLinepublic bool Equals(MyObject other)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (ReferenceEquals(null, other)) return false;Di2015NewLine    if (ReferenceEquals(this, other)) return true;Di2015NewLine    return other.listItems.Count == listItems.Count Di2015NewLine       && listItems.Select((l,i)=>other.listItems[i] == l).All(b=>b);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//order-independent equality; true if all items in one are in the other in any orderDi2015NewLinepublic bool Equals(MyObject other)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (ReferenceEquals(null, other)) return false;Di2015NewLine    if (ReferenceEquals(this, other)) return true;Di2015NewLine    return other.listItems.Count == listItems.Count Di2015NewLine       && listItems.Select((l,i)=>other.listItems.Contains(l)).All(b=>b);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12631400Di2015UniqueSeparatorTcpMessageConnection
12631400Di2015UniqueSeparator// Only class outline shownDi2015NewLinepublic class TcpMessageConnectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly MessageStream messageStream; // another custom classDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly TcpClient tcpClient;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public EndPoint RemoteEndPoint { get; private set; } // who connected here?Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MessageReader MessageReader { get; } // messageStream.ReaderDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MessageWriter MessageWriter { get; } // messageStream.WriterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsCurrentlyDisconnecting { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12631400Di2015UniqueSeparatorMessageReader
12631400Di2015UniqueSeparatorMessageWriter
12631467Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CancellationTokenSource cts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine    TcpListener listener = new TcpListener(IPAddress.Any, 6666);Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        listener.Start();Di2015NewLine        //just fire and forget. We break from the "forgotten" async loopsDi2015NewLine        //in AcceptClientsAsync using a CancellationToken from `cts`Di2015NewLine        AcceptClientsAsync(listener, cts.Token);Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(60000); //block here to hold open the serverDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cts.Cancel();Di2015NewLine        listener.Stop();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineasync Task AcceptClientsAsync(TcpListener listener, CancellationToken ct)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var clientCounter = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (!ct.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TcpClient client = await listener.AcceptTcpClientAsync()Di2015NewLine                                            .ConfigureAwait(false);Di2015NewLine        clientCounter++;Di2015NewLine        //once again, just fire and forget, and use the CancellationTokenDi2015NewLine        //to signal to the "forgotten" async invocation.Di2015NewLine        EchoAsync(client, clientCounter, ct);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineasync Task EchoAsync(TcpClient client,Di2015NewLine                     int clientIndex,Di2015NewLine                     CancellationToken ct)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("New client ({0}) connected", clientIndex);Di2015NewLine    using (client)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var buf = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine        var stream = client.GetStream();Di2015NewLine        while (!ct.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //under some circumstances, it's not possible to detectDi2015NewLine            //a client disconnecting if there's no data being sentDi2015NewLine            //so it's a good idea to give them a timeout to ensure that Di2015NewLine            //we clean them up.Di2015NewLine            var timeoutTask = Task.Delay(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(15));Di2015NewLine            var amountReadTask = stream.ReadAsync(buf, 0, buf.Length, ct);Di2015NewLine            var completedTask = await Task.WhenAny(timeoutTask, amountReadTask)Di2015NewLine                                          .ConfigureAwait(false);Di2015NewLine            if (completedTask == timeoutTask)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var msg = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes("Client timed out");Di2015NewLine                await stream.WriteAsync(msg, 0, msg.Length);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //now we know that the amountTask is complete soDi2015NewLine            //we can ask for its Result without blockingDi2015NewLine            var amountRead = amountReadTask.Result;Di2015NewLine            if (amountRead == 0) break; //end of stream.Di2015NewLine            await stream.WriteAsync(buf, 0, amountRead, ct)Di2015NewLine                        .ConfigureAwait(false);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Client ({0}) disconnected", clientIndex);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12639251Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void TextBox_TextChanged(object sender, TextChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextBox m_texti2cWrite = (TextBox)sender;Di2015NewLine        int count = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string text1 = m_texti2cWrite.Text;Di2015NewLine        string text = m_texti2cWrite.Text.Replace(" ", string.Empty);Di2015NewLine        string hexString = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        int countCaret = e.Changes.ToList()[0].Offset;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < text.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hexString += text[i];Di2015NewLine            if ((i + 1) % 2 == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (i != text.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    hexString = hexString + " ";Di2015NewLine                    count++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            count++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        m_texti2cWrite.Text = hexString;Di2015NewLine        if (text1.Length == countCaret)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_texti2cWrite.Select(count, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (e.Changes.ToList()[0].RemovedLength == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_texti2cWrite.Select(countCaret + 1, 0);Di2015NewLine                if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(hexString.Substring(countCaret, 1)))Di2015NewLine                    m_texti2cWrite.Select(countCaret + 2, 0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_texti2cWrite.Select(countCaret, 0);Di2015NewLine                if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(hexString.Substring(countCaret, 1)))Di2015NewLine                    m_texti2cWrite.Select(countCaret + 1, 0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12641541Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class JsonCreationConverter<T> : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// this is very important, otherwise serialization breaks!Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanWriteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// Create an instance of objectType, based properties in the JSON object Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="objectType">type of object expected</param> Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="jObject">contents of JSON object that will be Di2015NewLine    /// deserialized</param> Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns> Di2015NewLine    protected abstract T Create(Type objectType, JObject jObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return typeof(T).IsAssignableFrom(objectType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType,Di2015NewLine      object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (reader.TokenType == JsonToken.Null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        // Load JObject from stream Di2015NewLine        JObject jObject = JObject.Load(reader);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create target object based on JObject Di2015NewLine        T target = Create(objectType, jObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Populate the object properties Di2015NewLine        serializer.Populate(jObject.CreateReader(), target);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return target;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, Di2015NewLine      JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

12642868Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic versionRegex As Regex = New Regex( _Di2015NewLine   "^(?<prefix>.*?0*)(?<version>\\d+)$", _Di2015NewLine   RegexOptions.IgnoreCase _Di2015NewLine     Or RegexOptions.CultureInvariant _Di2015NewLine     Or RegexOptions.Compiled _Di2015NewLine )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePublic Shared Function GetNextVersion(oldVersion As String) As StringDi2015NewLine    Dim matches = versionRegex.Matches(oldVersion)Di2015NewLine    If (matches.Count <= 0) ThenDi2015NewLine        Return oldVersionDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim match = matches(0)Di2015NewLine    Dim prefix = match.Groups.Item("prefix").ValueDi2015NewLine    Dim version = CInt(match.Groups.Item("version").Value)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Return String.Format("{0}{1}", prefix, version + 1)Di2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return clonedList;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine 12644129Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void CreateImageFile()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Grid workGrid;Di2015NewLine    TextBlock workTextBlock;Di2015NewLine    RenderTargetBitmap bitmap;Di2015NewLine    PngBitmapEncoder encoder;Di2015NewLine    Rect textBlockBounds;Di2015NewLine    GeneralTransform transform;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    workGrid = new Grid()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        VerticalAlignment = VerticalAlignment.Center,Di2015NewLine        HorizontalAlignment = HorizontalAlignment.CenterDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    workTextBlock = new TextBlock()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Text = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing" + Environment.NewLine + "elit, sed do eiusmod tempor",Di2015NewLine        FontFamily = new FontFamily("Verdana"),Di2015NewLine        FontSize = 36,Di2015NewLine        TextAlignment = TextAlignment.Center,Di2015NewLine        RenderTransformOrigin = new Point(0.5, 0.5),Di2015NewLine        LayoutTransform = new RotateTransform(-45)Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    workGrid.Children.Add(workTextBlock);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*Di2015NewLine     * We now must measure and arrange the controls we just created to fill in the details (likeDi2015NewLine     * ActualWidth and ActualHeight before we call TransformToVisual() and TransformBounds()Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    workGrid.Measure(new Size(double.PositiveInfinity, double.PositiveInfinity));Di2015NewLine    workGrid.Arrange(new Rect(0, 0, workGrid.DesiredSize.Width, workGrid.DesiredSize.Height));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    transform = workTextBlock.TransformToVisual(workGrid);Di2015NewLine    textBlockBounds = transform.TransformBounds(new Rect(0, 0, workTextBlock.ActualWidth, workTextBlock.ActualHeight));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*Di2015NewLine     * Now, create the bitmap that will be used to save the image. We will make the image the Di2015NewLine     * height and width we need at 96DPI and 32-bit RGBA (so the background will be transparent).Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    bitmap = new RenderTargetBitmap((int)textBlockBounds.Width, (int)textBlockBounds.Height, 96, 96, PixelFormats.Pbgra32);Di2015NewLine    bitmap.Render(workGrid);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    encoder = new PngBitmapEncoder();Di2015NewLine    encoder.Frames.Add(BitmapFrame.Create(bitmap));Di2015NewLine    using (FileStream file = new FileStream("TextImage.png", FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLine        encoder.Save(file);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12645178Di2015UniqueSeparator//Di2015NewLine// 1. Create two dimensional arrayDi2015NewLine//Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineconst int  dim = 1000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedouble[,]  array = new double[dim,dim];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineRandom ran = new Random();Di2015NewLinefor(int r = 0; r < dim; r++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for(int c = 0; c < dim; c++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        array[r,c] = (ran.Next(dim)); // fill it with random numbers.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// 2. 12648904Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void PrintSystemInfo(XElement doc, Di2015NewLine                                string className, Di2015NewLine                                string[] properties)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ManagementObjectSearcher MOS = Di2015NewLine             new ManagementObjectSearcher("Select * from " + className);Di2015NewLine        XElement xClass = new XElement(className);Di2015NewLine        int count = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (ManagementObject o in MOS.Get())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XElement child = new XElement(string.Concat(className, count++));Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < properties.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    child.Add(new XElement(properties[i], o[properties[i]]));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    child.Add(new XElement(properties[i], ex.Message));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            xClass.Add(child);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        doc.Add(xClass);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12649107Di2015UniqueSeparator    ConcurrentQueue<byte[]> writePendingData = new ConcurrentQueue<byte[]>();Di2015NewLine    bool sendingData = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void EnqueueDataForWrite(SslStream sslStream, byte[] buffer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (buffer == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        writePendingData.Enqueue(buffer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lock (writePendingData)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (sendingData)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sendingData = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Write(sslStream); args) {Di2015NewLine            const string SERVICE_NAME = "AWSMechanicalTurkRequester";  // requester service for MTurkDi2015NewLine            const string TIMESTAMP_FORMAT = "yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Modify these with your values.Di2015NewLine            const string operation = "GetAccountBalance";Di2015NewLine            const string accessKey = "<Your access key>";Di2015NewLine            const string secretAccessKey = "<Your secret access key>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Millisecond values in the timestamp string can result in intermittent BadClaimsSupplied errors.Di2015NewLine            // Get the current UTC time and use that to create a new time with milliseconds set to zero to avoid this case.Di2015NewLine            DateTime now = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLine            now = new DateTime(now.Year, now.Month, now.Day, now.Hour, now.Minute, now.Second, 0, DateTimeKind.Utc);Di2015NewLine            string timeStamp = now.ToString(TIMESTAMP_FORMAT, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create the hash-based messaged authentication algorithm (SHA1) using our secret access key as the key.Di2015NewLine            var hmac = new HMACSHA1(Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(secretAccessKey));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Combine the service name, operation and timestamp and then hash them to produce the signature.Di2015NewLine            var dataBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(SERVICE_NAME + operation + timeStamp);Di2015NewLine            string signature = Convert.ToBase64String(hmac.ComputeHash(dataBytes));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Build the URL to send to AmazonDi2015NewLine            string url =Di2015NewLine                @"https://mechanicalturk.amazonaws.com/?Service=AWSMechanicalTurkRequester&AWSAccessKeyId={0}&Version=2012-03-25&Operation={1}&Signature={2}&Timestamp={3}";Di2015NewLine            url = string.Format(url, accessKey, operation, signature, timeStamp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Send a request and write the response to the console.Di2015NewLine            using (WebClient client = new WebClient()) {Di2015NewLine                using (StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(client.OpenRead(url))) {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(reader.ReadToEnd());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.Read();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12653433Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar hyphens = myString.Split('-');Di2015NewLinetopTitle = hyphens[0].Replace("_", " ");Di2015NewLinesubTitle = hyphens.Length > 1 ? hyphens[1].Replace("_", " ") : "n/a";Di2015NewLine

12653559Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class LocalesRetrievalException: ExceptionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       public LocalesRetrievalException(string message): base(message)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Windows APIDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private delegate bool EnumLocalesProcExDelegate(Di2015NewLine       [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPWStr)]String lpLocaleString,Di2015NewLine       LocaleType dwFlags, int lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport(@"kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true, CharSet = CharSet.Unicode)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern bool EnumSystemLocalesEx(EnumLocalesProcExDelegate pEnumProcEx,Di2015NewLine       LocaleType dwFlags, int lParam, IntPtr lpReserved);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private enum LocaleType : uintDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       LocaleAll = 0x00000000,             // Enumerate all named based localesDi2015NewLine       LocaleWindows = 0x00000001,         // Shipped locales and/or replacements for themDi2015NewLine       LocaleSupplemental = 0x00000002,    // Supplemental locales onlyDi2015NewLine       LocaleAlternateSorts = 0x00000004,  // Alternate sort localesDi2015NewLine       LocaleNeutralData = 0x00000010,     // Locales that are "neutral" (language only, region data is default)Di2015NewLine       LocaleSpecificData = 0x00000020,    // Locales that contain language and region dataDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public enum CultureTypes : uintDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       SpecificCultures = LocaleType.LocaleSpecificData,Di2015NewLine       NeutralCultures = LocaleType.LocaleNeutralData,Di2015NewLine       AllCultures = LocaleType.LocaleWindowsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IReadOnlyCollection<CultureInfo> GetCultures(Di2015NewLine       CultureTypes cultureTypes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       List<CultureInfo> cultures = new List<CultureInfo>();Di2015NewLine       EnumLocalesProcExDelegate enumCallback = (locale, flags, lParam) =>Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          tryDi2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine             cultures.Add(new CultureInfo(locale));Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          catch (CultureNotFoundException)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine             // This culture is not supported by .NET (not happened so far)Di2015NewLine             // Must be ignored.Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          return true;Di2015NewLine       };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if (EnumSystemLocalesEx(enumCallback, (LocaleType)cultureTypes, 0, Di2015NewLine          (IntPtr)0) == false)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          int errorCode = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine          throw new LocalesRetrievalException("Win32 error " + errorCode + Di2015NewLine             " while trying to get the Windows locales");Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // Add the two neutral cultures that Windows misses Di2015NewLine       // (CultureInfo.GetCultures adds them also):Di2015NewLine       if (cultureTypes == CultureTypes.NeutralCultures || Di2015NewLine          cultureTypes == CultureTypes.AllCultures)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          cultures.Add(new CultureInfo("zh-CHS"));Di2015NewLine          cultures.Add(new CultureInfo("zh-CHT"));Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       return new ReadOnlyCollection<CultureInfo>(cultures);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

12656362Di2015UniqueSeparatorIntPtr EmbedProcess(Control Panel, string Path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string Name = NameFromPath(Path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Process Task in Process.GetProcesses())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (NameFromPath(Task.ProcessName).Contains(Name))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            try { Task.Kill(); }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e) {  }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Process Task = Process.Start(Path);Di2015NewLine        Task.WaitForInputIdle();Di2015NewLine        IntPtr Handle = new IntPtr();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; Handle == IntPtr.Zero && i < 10; i++) { Handle = Task.MainWindowHandle; Thread.Sleep(100); }Di2015NewLine        SetParent(Handle, Panel.Handle);Di2015NewLine        SetWindowLong(Handle, GWL_STYLE, (int)(WS_VISIBLE + (WS_MAXIMIZE | WS_BORDER)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MoveWindow(Handle, 0, 0, Panel.Width, Panel.Height, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Panel.Resize += new EventHandler(delegate(object sender, EventArgs e) { MoveWindow(Handle, 0, 0, Panel.Width, Panel.Height, true); });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.FormClosed += new FormClosedEventHandler(delegate(object sender, FormClosedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SendMessage(Handle, 83, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine            Handle = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Handle;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e) { MessageBox.Show(this, e.Message, "Error"); }Di2015NewLine    return new IntPtr();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12664444Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class KeyConverter {Di2015NewLine            //All conversions are stored in this dictionary.Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<Keys, Keys> conversions = new Dictionary<Keys, Keys>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public KeyConverter() {Di2015NewLine        //this conversion will convert every Ctrl+C signal into Ctrl+VDi2015NewLine        conversions.Add(Keys.C | Keys.Control, Keys.V | Keys.Control);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Keys Convert(Keys keys) {Di2015NewLine        if (conversions.ContainsKey(keys))Di2015NewLine            return conversions[keys];Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return keys;  //return the input if no conversion is availableDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
12664444Di2015UniqueSeparator[DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern void keybd_event(byte bVk, byte bScan, uint dwFlags, uint dwExtraInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void SendKey(Keys keys){Di2015NewLine    foreach(Keys key in Enum.GetValues(typeof(Keys)))Di2015NewLine        if(keys.HasFlag(key))Di2015NewLine            keybd_event((byte)key, 0, 0, 0); //press keyDi2015NewLine    foreach(Keys key in Enum.GetValues(typeof(Keys)))Di2015NewLine        if(keys.HasFlag(key))Di2015NewLine            keybd_event((byte)key, 0, 0x2, 0); // release keyDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
